description: Designed in collaboration with BD Athlete Joe Grant, the Sprint Short is a running short built to move fast while carrying the essentials you need for a proper adventure in the mountains.
name: Black Diamond Sprint Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Stretch Nylon Plain weave Face with DWR finish - 88% Nylon, 12% Elastane, 67 gsm
Polyester Mesh with Wicking finish - 100% Polyester, 95 gsm
